short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share specific moments of youtube videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to share a short clip of a youtube video.

Usage:
1. Install the extension.
2. Visit a youtube page, you will notice a new red record button below the youtube video.
4. Click the button to start recording and once again to stop.
5. You will be redirect to a link to share the clip.
